subScenes.name: 问候与开场
subScenes.description: 乘客向工作人员礼貌打招呼并说明来意

qaPairs.speakerText: Hi there! I'm catching the 2 PM bus to Chicago—can you help me out?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 嗨！我要坐下午两点去芝加哥的车，能帮帮我吗？

responses.text: Of course! What do you need to know?
Sure thing! Just ask away.
Yeah, go ahead.

qaPairs.usageNote: 用礼貌开场语自然引出需求

subScenes.name: 询问班次时间
subScenes.description: 乘客确认发车时间及是否准点

qaPairs.speakerText: Just to double-check, is the 2 PM bus still leaving on time?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 我再确认下，两点的车还准点发车吗？

responses.text: Yep, no delays—boarding starts at 1:45.
Absolutely! It’s on schedule as usual.
On time.

qaPairs.speakerText: Is there a later bus if I miss this one?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 如果赶不上这班，有下一班吗？

responses.text: Yeah, the next one’s at 5 PM—same route.
responses.text_cn: 有，下一班是五点，路线一样。

responses.text: There’s a 5:30, but it’s a bit slower.
responses.text_cn: 五点半有一班，但慢一点。

responses.text: No later ones.

qaPairs.usageNote: 询问替代方案体现应变能力

subScenes.name: 行李规定咨询
subScenes.description: 乘客询问行李尺寸与免费额度

qaPairs.speakerText: How much luggage can I bring? I’ve got a big backpack and a suitcase.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 我能带多少行李？我有个大背包和一���行李箱。

responses.text: You’re good! One checked bag and one carry-on are free.
responses.text_cn: 没问题！一件托运行李加一件随身行李免费。

responses.text: Yep, that’s totally fine—no extra charge.
responses.text_cn: 完全没问题，不收额外费用。

responses.text: Free for two.

qaPairs.usageNote: 用‘I’ve got’自然描述携带物品

subScenes.name: 车上设施确认
subScenes.description: 乘客了解是否有Wi-Fi、充电口和卫生间

qaPairs.speakerText: Does the bus have Wi-Fi and power outlets?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 车上有没有Wi-Fi和电源插座？

responses.text: Yep, free Wi-Fi and outlets at every seat.
responses.text_cn: 有，免费Wi-Fi，每个座位都有插座。

responses.text: All seats got USB ports and Wi-Fi—no problem.
responses.text_cn: 每个座位都有USB口和Wi-Fi，没问题。

responses.text: Yes, both.

qaPairs.usageNote: 用‘at every seat’明确位置更实用

qaPairs.speakerText: And are there restrooms on board?

responses.text: Yes, there’s one at the back—clean and stocked.
responses.text_cn: 有，在车尾，干净且备有用品。

responses.text: Yep, and they refill at stops.
Yes.

subScenes.name: 购票与道别
subScenes.description: 乘客完成购票并礼貌告别

qaPairs.speakerText: I’d like to buy a one-way ticket to Chicago—cash or card?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 我想买一张去芝加哥的单程票，现金还是刷卡？

responses.text: Card’s faster, but we take both—here’s your receipt.
responses.text_cn: 刷卡更快，但两种都收，这是你的收据。

responses.text: Either’s fine—I’ll take card, thanks.
Card.

qaPairs.usageNote: 用‘I’d like to’表达礼貌购买意愿

qaPairs.speakerText: Thanks so much—you’ve been super helpful!

responses.text: You’re welcome! Have a great trip!
No problem! See you in Chicago!
Sure thing!
